content.rendered:
On the second day, we had the joy of air conditioning whilst shopping in Orlando’s biggest outlet complex. We arrived around 11am and, armed with 8 hours and daddy’s spending money we set off. The heat did prove unbearable for some however, as they escaped to the cinema to watch Disney’s Inside Out, play minigolf, and visit a traditionally American shop.

Others, mainly the girls, managed to find the power to shop the entire time. After a quick Walmart stop on the way back to buy the finest American delicacies (pop tart, anyone?), the team retired back to the hotel.

Overall an enjoyable day for all, with much more to take back in our suitcases now.
